modName: Daedric Armor and Weapon Improvement 4K - DELETED
summary: 2K and 4K upscales of Daedric Armor and Weapon Improvement by GarryG. UNP, UUNP, or weapons only.
descriptionHtml:
[b][center][size=4]
[size=5]Description[/size]

These are 4K and 2K upscales of Daedric Armor and Weapon Improvement by GarryG.
Includes all armor and weapon textures upscaled to 4K or 2K.
The arrow quiver had files that were only 512px in the original mod.
Many of the smaller armor pieces and weapons had files that were only 1024px.
[b][size=4]Every texture and normal has been properly resampled and upscaled to 4096px or 2048px.[/size][/b]
UUNP BodySlide conversion set by Diablio.
Based on default glow 256 replacer version, does not require original mod.
You can still use glow replacers if you would like.
If they are compatible with the original GarryG mod, they are still compatible.
Which means you can change the glow to whatever you want, including no glow.
You will need to run BodySlide to shape the UUNP for your preset.[/size][/center][/b]


[size=4][b][center][size=5]Requirements[/size]

Realistic Force by dDefinder
XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended by Groovtama
HDT Physics Extensions by HydrogensaysHDT
4K Daedric Armor and Weapon Improvement for UUNP by GarryG Diablio and ShmooZ
BodySlide and Outfit Studio by Caliente - install UUNP body, choose options HDT, etc.[/center][/b][/size]
[center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center][center][/center][center][/center][center][size=6][b]
Amazing screenshots by Ista[/b][/size]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/qyoJdGP.jpg[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/CIBRx9U.jpg[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/PlhQBdL.jpg[/img]﻿[/center]

[center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center]
[b][center][size=5]Permissions[/size]

[size=4]GarryG gives permission on his permission tab as long as he is credited.
Diablio also gave me permission 07-25-17 to use the UUNP BodySlide conversion.[/size]

[size=5]Credits[/size]

[size=4]GarryG - Original mod author
Diablio - UUNP conversion set
ShmooZ - 4K upscaled textures
[b]Ista - Incredible looking vertical screenshots by Ista[/b]
Klaxoid - Incredible 1080p screenshots
Rudy102 - Rudy vanilla ENB
 Kobalk and Myloween - [b][size=4]Rampage ENB
[b][size=4]ZwabberdieBo - Antique Dragon ENB[/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/center][/b]
author: GarryG Diablio and ShmooZ
